home.title: Civolución - Asistente para juego en solitario
home.play1: Juega Civolution contra CIVICA, tu oponente de inteligencia artificial.
home.play2: Esta aplicación sustituye la baraja de cartas de solitario, gestiona los niveles de dificultad y te guía a través del juego con las reglas de solitario.

vici.about: Si quieres jugar a Civolución, pemite que te presentemos a CIVICA, una entidad de I-CIV con el objetivo de simular civilizaciones reales.

setupBot.title: Configurar CIVICA
setupBot.placeDisks: Elige un color para CIVICA, coge los 7 discos de ese color y coloca uno sobre cada uno de tus discos en los tableros de juego.
setupBot.takeTribesMarkers: Coloca 15 tribus (las 5 restantes no se usan) y 50 marcadores del color de CIVICA en la reserva de CIVICA.
setupBot.placeStartingTribes: Coloca 1 de las tribus de CIVICA en el campamento sin fogata restante del territorio de Bosque inicial y 1 de las tribus en el campamento sin fogata restante del territorio de Prado inicial.
setupBot.placeProvisionMarker: Coloca un marcador tumbado en cada uno de los dos territorios iniciales junto al espacio de construcción de granja. Estos marcadores no representan materiales sino que se denominan marcadores de provisiones.
setupBot.takeDice: Coloca 6 dados de activación y 1 dado de destino en la zona de juego de CIVICA.
setupBot.diceNotice: No los lances, se usan para llevar la cuenta del número de dados de CIVICA.
setupBot.noOtherComponents: El resto de componentes no son usados por CIVICA.

newGoals.title: 2) Nuevos objetivos
newGoals.botDetermine: Elige la loseta de objetivo para CIVICA.
newGoals.botTakeGoal: Retira la loseta de objetivo {goalChip} (si está disponible).
newGoals.botNoGoal: No se retira loseta de objetivo.

turnBot.title: V.I.C.I
turnBot.resetAdvance: Advance the phase indicator to the next reset space.

roundEnd.title: Fin de Era

sitePhase.title: 5) Site phase
sitePhase.botNotAffected: V.I.C.I is never affected by face-up sites.

feedTribes.title: A) V.I.C.I Feeding phase:
feedTribes.oneProvisioningMarker: In territories with 1 provision marker, 1 tribe on an encampment is fed. Priority:
feedTribes.twoProvisioningMarkers: In territories with 2 provision markers, all tribes on encampments + 1 tribe in wilderness (strong over weak) are fed.

eventPhase.title: 7) Event phase
eventPhase.adjustWeather: A) V.I.C.I is never affected by the weather.

resolveEvent.title: B) V.I.C.I never gets event bonuses.
resolveEvent.compareBot: However, you must take V.I.C.I into account when determining whether you receive the bonus of an event that requires a majority or lead.
resolveEvent.eventsDetails: Event F4, F6, F16, F17, F19 or F20

eventPhase.scoreCategory: C) Score current category for V.I.C.I.

roundEnd.noNextStartPlayer: Please determine the next start player.

gameEnd.title: Final de Partida

finalScoring.title: Puntuación Final
finalScoring.categories: Score 9 final scoring categories (you and V.I.C.I)
finalScoring.consoleStages: Score the stage partition of the console (only you)
finalScoring.consoleResearchCards: Score point bonuses from research cards in the console (only you)

gameEnd.winCondition: If you managed to have more success points in total than V.I.C.I, congratulations on a successful Civolution!

endRoundButton.title: End Action Phase
endRoundButton.confirm: Do you want to end the action phase?

advanceFavor.title: Agera track
advanceFavor.instruction: Advance V.I.C.I’s disc 1 step on the Favor of Agera track (if possible).

advanceScoringCategory.title: Progress Track
advanceScoringCategory.instruction: Advance V.I.C.I’s disc that many steps on the depicted progress track.
advanceScoringCategory.threshold: Whenever one of V.I.C.I’s discs crosses a bonus threshold that gives success points as a track bonus, V.I.C.I receives those points. All other track bonuses are ignored for V.I.C.I.
advanceScoringCategory.exceedTrack: If V.I.C.I’s disc is already on space 12 of this track, this action gives V.I.C.I the usual 2 success points instead.

gainActivationDie.title: Activation Die
gainActivationDie.instruction: V.I.C.I receives an activation die (per the usual rules).

gainFateDie.title: Fate Die
gainFateDie.instruction: V.I.C.I receives a fate die (per the usual rules).

gainVp.title: Success Points
gainVp.instruction: V.I.C.I gains the depicted number of success points.

initialTerritory.title: Initial Territory
initialTerritory.minimumRequirement: Choose a territory where V.I.C.I has at least 2 tribes, at least 1 of them is strong.
initialTerritory.twoTribesAvailability: Attention: If there is no such territory, first perform a procreation.

destinationTerritory.title: Destination Territory
destinationTerritory.minimumRequirement: Choose a land territory, adjacent to the initial territory.
destinationTerritory.priorityRequirement: Priority: Territory with V.I.C.I's fewest tribes (none = fewest).
destinationTerritory.moveTribe: Move the determined strong tribe there and let it settle on an encampment:
destinationTerritory.undevelopedTerritory: If the tribe enters an undeveloped territory, flip its material tile face up but do not place a marker there.

performProcreation.title: Procreation
performProcreation.minimumRequirement: Choose a territory with at least 1 of V.I.C.I's tribes.
performProcreation.priorityRequirement: Priority: Territory with at least 1 free encampment.
performProcreation.territoryDetermined: Once you’ve determined the territory, add a tribe from V.IC.I’s supply to that territory by letting it settle on an encampment:
performProcreation.migrationCheck: Important: Check after each procreation that you carry out for V.I.C.I whether all encampments in all territories where V.I.C.I has tribes are solely occupied by V.I.C.I’s own tribes (and thus, none are free or occupied by your tribes). If so, immediately perform 1 migration in addition.

performProvision.title: Provision
performProvision.minimumRequirement: Choose a territory, where V.I.C.I has at least one tribe.
performProvision.priorityRequirement: Priority: Territories with the fewest provision markers (0 = fewest) and V.I.C.I's most tribes.
performProvision.placeMarker: Place a provision marker in the territory.
performProvision.blockFarmSpace: Once a territory has two provision markers, they block the farm building space (if it's still unoccupied).

placeEvolutionMarker.title: Evolution
placeEvolutionMarker.instruction: V.I.C.I gains Evolution marker (these are counted automatically by the application).

placeHuntingToken.title: Hunting Token
placeHuntingToken.minimumRequirement: Choose a territory, where V.I.C.I has at least one tribe, and where there is no hunting token yet.
placeHuntingToken.priorityRequirement: Priority: Territories, where you also have a tribe.
placeHuntingToken.placeToken: Place a hunting token in the territory.

placeProsperityMarker.title: Prosperity
placeProsperityMarker.instruction: V.I.C.I gains Prosperity marker (these are counted automatically by the application).

placeStatue.title: Statue
placeStatue.instruction: Place a marker from V.IC.I’s supply as a statue onto the Building ground in the large Water territory.
placeStatue.unlimited: There is no limit to the number of statues V.I.C.I can have there.

removeCard.title: Remove Research Card
removeCard.instruction: Remove the top card from the face-up research stack of the depicted type.
removeCard.refill: If the face-up stack is empty afterwards, refill it at as usual.

revealSites.title: Reveal Sites
revealSites.minimumRequirement: Choose a territory, where V.I.C.I has at least one tribe.
revealSites.priorityRequirement: Priority: Territories adjacent to the most face-down sites.
revealSites.reveal: Reveal all face-down sites adjacent to the territory.
revealSites.gainVP: V.I.C.I gains the success points printed on the front of each site that is revealed. Besides this, V.I.C.I’s civilization is never affected by any face-up sites.

encampment.playerFire: Fire encampment with one of your tribes
encampment.playerWeakAny: Any encampment with one of your weak tribes
encampment.playerStrongAny: Any encampment with one of your strong tribes
encampment.botStrongFire: Fire encampment with one of V.I.C.I's strong tribes
encampment.botStrongAny: Any encampment with one of V.I.C.I's strong tribes
encampment.botWeakFire: Fire encampment with one of V.I.C.I's weak tribes
encampment.botWeakAny: Any encampment with one of V.I.C.I's weak tribes
encampment.notWeakened: Attention: V.I.C.I's tribes are not weakened when they displace tribes from encampments!

action.abortGameConfirm: Se va a finalizar la partida - ¿estás seguro?
action.endGameConfirm: Finalizar la partida y volver a la página de inicio - ¿estás seguro?

serviceWorkerUpdatedRefresh.title: Actualizar aplicación
serviceWorkerUpdatedRefresh.notice: La aplicación ha sido actualizada - ¿quieres recargar para usar la última versión?
